body.name: TruSkin BHA Liquid Exfoliant & Toner – PHA AHA BHA Gentle Exfoliator with Salicylic & Glycolic Acid, Vitamin C – Smooth Uneven Tone & Texture, Refine Pores, Minimize Oily Skin & Fine Lines, 4.2 Fl Oz
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 25% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
features: GENTLE, NOURISHING EXFOLIANT: PHA AHA BHA skin toner gently exfoliates and buffs away dead skin cells, unclogs and shrinks the look of pores, brightens and evens tone while leaving skin feeling soft and healthy; made with sensitive skin in mind

TRIPLE ACID + MORE: Infused with a unique acid blend of AHA, BHA, and PHA to provide gentle exfoliation with less irritation than high percentage blends; Vitamin C & Turmeric brighten and even tone and Reishi mushroom moisturizes skin

REFRESH & RENEW: This lightweight, fragrance free exfoliating toner leaves skin feeling refreshed & clean. After cleansing, apply to face and neck, avoiding eye area; do not rinse; always patch test 24 hours before regular use. Apply SPF daily

BLENDED TO BE BETTER: This AHA, BHA, & PHA exfoliant is a balanced medley of key antioxidants and nourishing botanical actives to enhance efficacy and deliver skin friendly benefits; dermatologist-tested & cruelty-free

THE TRUSKIN DIFFERENCE: If for any reason you decide this product isn’t a fit for your skin, we’re here for you; each carefully crafted formula works to deliver benefits without additives or fragrances

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Liquid Exfoliant Ocean Minerals Toner Vitamin C Cleanser Vitamin C Serum Vitamin C Moisturizer Vitamin C Sunscreen SPF 30 Skin Benefits Gently exfoliates, unclogs & shrinks look of pores, and brightens skin tone Helps wash away impurities while hydrating, refreshing & revitalizing skin Cleanse deeply to remove impurities & makeup while boosting luminosity Boost radiance, fade dark spots and improve tone and texture Moisturize while softening lines and wrinkles, and improving radiance Broad spectrum UV protection for a good glow Key Ingredients AHA, BHA, PHA Acid Blend, Vitamin C, Reishi Mushroom Ocean Minerals Complex, MSM, Vitamin C & Glycolic Acid Vitamin C, Orange Peel, MSM, Organic Aloe Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, MSM, Witch Hazel Vitamin C, Vitamin B5, Green Tea + Jojoba Oil Vitamin C, Zinc Oxide, Vegan Marine Collagen Fragrance-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Frequency Can be used daily, depending on skin tolerance Can be used daily as needed Can be used daily Can be used daily Can be used day or night Use daily before sun exposure Texture Lightweight Liquid Light Mist Foaming Gel Weightless Serum Hydrating Lotion Sheer Lotion Skin Care Step Exfoliate Revive Cleanse Treat Hydrate Protect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using their Vitamin C product for years, but did not realize they carried a whole line of products. So when I saw this, I was like "oh yes"! So now I use this, plus their face wash and of course their Vitamin C, which definitely helps with firming my skin. Very happy I found this and have set up on subscribe and save so I don't have to worry about running out. I love this stuff!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this line of products
reviews.reviewText: I have been using TruSkin products for about the last 5 years and I absolutely love them. They work great, smell good and are decently priced. I have a normal skin type and I have not had any issues with being oily or drying out. The products absorb nicely and last a good long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loving it so far
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only used this product for a couple weeks, but I’m loving it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product use it faithfullyThis brand of product line is the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good product - would recommend
reviews.reviewText: My skin felt very clean and smooth after my first use. I will definitely purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: light scent, quality, does what it is supposed to do, make skin soft and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product came quickly, and has lived up to its claims, cleaning skin of dirt left behind. Has started to clear up bumpy spots that often break out, trouble spots that haven't been a problem since I started using it a couple weeks ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received this product a few days ago and have used I twice - I’ve already noticed a big difference in my pores. The product really does seem to be sloughing off all the stuff I’ve tried hard to get rid of with other products. I will definitely be repurchasing this exfoliant if things continue to go the same way!
